question: The compound interest on 5000 Rs. for 3 years at 10% per annum will amount to :
explanation:
$latex \\because CI = p\\left [ \\left ( 1+\\frac{R}{100} \\right )^{T}-1 \\right ]&s=1$
$latex = 5000\\left [ \\left ( 1+\\frac{10}{100} \\right )^{3}-1 \\right ]&s=1$
$latex = 5000\\left [ \\left ( \\frac{11}{10} \\right )^{3}-1 \\right ]&s=1$
$latex => CI = \\frac{5000\\times 331}{1000} = 1655\\ Rs.&s=1$
Hence option [D] is correct answer.
